subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar fans might get a look at the open-wheel racing star Juan Pablo Montoya sooner than expected as he is leaving his Formula One McLaren Mercedes team immediately.
snippet: Nascar fans might get a look at the open-wheel racing star Juan Pablo Montoya sooner than expected as he is leaving his Formula One McLaren Mercedes team immediately.
